verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya dayā-maya
patita-pāvana jaya, jaya mahāśaya

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dayā-maya—the most merciful; patita-pāvana—the savior of the fallen souls; jaya—glories; jaya—glories; mahāśaya—to the great personality.
translation: "All glories to Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the most merciful savior of the fallen souls! All glories to the Supreme Personality!
